flawed_nl_solution:
The kingfisher caught 13 + 7 = <<13+7=20>>20 fish.
The pelican and kingfisher caught 13 + 20 = <<13+20=29>>29 fish
The fisherman caught 3 x 29 = <<3*29=87>>87 fish
The fisherman caught 87 - 13 = <<87-13=74>>74 more fish than the pelican.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 33, not 29. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
